Name: Ninshi Masuta
About the game: Ninshi Masuta is a 2D action game, where you need to act fast and think like a ninja to keep yourself alive. Get ready to face more than 20 levels and 8 bosses to free the city from criminals. Incredible high resolution graphics running at 1080p and precise controls with fluent 60 frames per second. Use weapons like shurikens and grenades, in addition to your fists to defeat your enemies. Features 20+ levels to beat High resolution graphics Gamepad support Leaderboards Achievements Sound Test
